title: The “Bombshell” That Wasn’t (Ep 1401)
description:
In this episode, I provide hard evidence of the media’s role in promoting a viral hoax. 

News Picks:

Is President Trump going to pardon Mike Flynn?


No, Parler wasn’t “hacked.” This is a BS story being promoted by the liberal media to try and stop Parler.

Is Fakebook targeting conservative websites again?

School systems are reporting increased rates of failure from virtual learning. 

Here is the CDC data on coronavirus infections. 

Book publishers employers reportedly crying after news of Jordan Peterson’s new book.
